description: Spiffbet AB engages in the development of games and technical platforms. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm. The company went IPO on 2015-04-27. The company operates a marketplace for professional users to manage price and risk strategies dealing with odds. The company comprises instruments to hedge price (Spiffindex) and hedge risk (Darkpool). The company is available through the Website or an application program interface (API), which facilitates automated trading. Spiffindex is a game, which allows users to predict match results and prices in order to secure the bets or speculate in odds' movements. Darkpool offers the option to back and lay selections, define conditions of orders and place them if the defined criteria are met. The Company’s operational activities are based in Malta, whereas the development of games and platforms and programming is conducted in Sweden.
naicsNationalIndustry: Internet Publishing and Broadcasting and Web Search Portals
name: Spiffbet AB
